lines.text: Are you one of those pro-skiers?
Oh no, not me. I don't go for those
What kind of sports *do* you go in for?
Well I'll tell you. I like to stand at the poolside. Oh, and occasionally get... Happy feet! Whoa!
And when I get bored, I occasionally get... Jacque Costeau happy feet!
Everybody feels like a loser once in a while.
That's easy for you to say, you live a fascinating life; fast pace, great people, life on the road!
Sure beats Grimsby, I'll tell ya! Back there you're considered worldly if ya buy your lunch at work instead of brown-bagging it!
Sometimes, we get really wild and drive to Buffalo for chicken-wings!
